price: Dize: "A Verdade chegou, e a falsidade nada inicia nem repete ."
arabic: قُلۡ جَآءَ ٱلۡحَقُّ وَمَا يُبۡدِئُ ٱلۡبَٰطِلُ وَمَا يُعِيدُ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: qul jāa al-ḥaqu wamā yub'di-u al-bāṭilu wamā yuʿīdu
